name: Guiding Lantern

awakening_skills.name: Shuraba (Shura King Realm)
awakening_skills.description: All enemies will receive an extra 3% of Asura's attributes reduction

awakening_skills.name: Hatred Heart (Antipathy heart)
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: CRIT+10%, FOR+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

introduction: On this lonely road, there is always a need for guidance, no matter whether it is the light in her heart. Asura didn't seem to treat the enemies' souls so cruelly, and it was a bit of comfort for the bruised fleshes in Shuraba.
